item.title: Odd Lots：华盛顿最热门餐厅的经营之道（播客）
item.description: 今年早些时候，当 Odd Lots 团队来到华盛顿特区时，我们在一家名为 Butterworth's 的餐厅享用了一顿美味佳肴。事实证明，这家餐厅是 MAGA 人群最热门的聚集地之一，史蒂夫-班农等人经常出现在餐厅里。当然，餐厅在正常情况下是很难经营的，但在特区，政治周期一直在变化，不同的酒吧和餐厅会与特定的政治人物联系在一起。【原文：When the Odd Lots team was down in Washington DC earlier this year, we had a phenomenal meal at a restaurant called Butterworth’s. As it turns out, the restaurant is one of the hottest hangouts for the MAGA crowd, with Steve Bannon and others frequently seen in its dining room. Of course, restaurants are difficult businesses in normal conditions, but in DC, you have the added factor that political cycles are changing all the time, and different bars and restaurants become associated with specifi】

item.title: 欧洲股市追随全球涨势，2026 年伊始创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲股市在新年伊始创下历史新高，追随全球股市因经济增长持续乐观而出现的涨势，而矿业公司则因大宗商品价格上涨而反弹。【原文：European stocks began the new year at all-time highs, tracking gains across global equities on persisting optimism around economic growth, while miners rallied on higher commodity prices.】

item.title: 刚果将把 2025 年钴配额延期三个月
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的钴矿产商将可以把去年的出口配额延期至 2026 年，因为新程序的制定工作出现延误，导致无法发货。【原文：Cobalt miners in the Democratic Republic of Congo will be able to roll last year’s export quotas into 2026 as delays in setting up new procedures prevented shipments.】

item.title: 受经济增长风险影响，美国 30 年期国债收益率升至 9 月以来最高点
item.description: 由于对美国经济增长前景的乐观情绪抑制了对避险资产的需求，国债在 2026 年的第一个交易日下跌，30 年期国债收益率升至 9 月初以来的最高点。【原文：Treasuries fell on the first trading day of 2026, with the yield on 30-year bonds rising to the highest since early September as optimism about the US growth outlook damped demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 调查显示，亚洲高级投资银行家招聘人数猛增 60
item.description: 招聘公司 Maven Partnership 的调查显示，随着交易流量的回升，2025 年亚太地区高级投资银行家的招聘人数猛增 60%。【原文：Hiring of senior investment bankers jumped 60% across Asia-Pacific in 2025 amid a pickup in deal flow, according to a survey by recruitment firm Maven Partnership.】

item.title: 欧佩克成员国加蓬在评级下调几天后解雇财政部长
item.description: 加蓬总统布莱斯-奥利吉-恩圭马（Brice Oligui Nguema）在国家信用评级被进一步下调为垃圾级几天后解雇了国家财政部长亨利-克劳德-奥伊马（Henri Claude Oyima）。【原文：Gabon’s President Brice Oligui Nguema fired the nation’s finance minister, Henri Claude Oyima days after the nation’s credit rating was cut deeper into junk.】

item.title: 首席执行官不寻常的 "三星回来了 "言论推动韩国科技股反弹
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）联席首席执行官引用顾客的话说 "三星回来了"，进一步推动了周五亚洲科技股的大涨，该公司股价创下六个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s shares gained their most in six months after its co-chief executive officer quoted customers as saying “Samsung is Back,” further fueling a broader Asian tech stock rally Friday.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称，2025 年末英国房价意外下跌
item.description: 据一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，英国 12 月份的房价意外下跌，这表明房地产市场可能受到了工党增税预算案的影响。【原文：UK house prices unexpectedly fell in December, according to a top mortgage lender, in a sign that the property market may have been affected by Labour’s tax-hiking budget.】

item.title: 晚周期 "波动迫在眉睫，人工智能热情提振亚洲科技界
item.description: 在芯片制造商和人工智能相关公司的带动下，亚洲科技股以新的涨势拉开了今年的序幕。然而，投资者越来越担心，该行业的强劲涨势可能会进入一个更加动荡的阶段。【原文：Asian technology stocks kicked off the year with fresh gains, led by chipmakers and artificial intelligence-related names. Yet investors are growing more wary that the sector’s powerful rally may be entering a more volatile phase.】

item.title: 棕榈油因原油走弱和马来西亚棕榈油出口下降而下跌
item.description: 棕榈油连续第二个交易日下跌，创下两周来的最低点，原因是原油走弱和马来西亚出口下降。【原文：Palm oil fell for a second session, hitting the lowest in two weeks as it tracked weaker crude and declining Malaysian exports.】

item.title: 税收冲击 "引发评级下调，印度 ITC 损失 70 亿美元
item.description: 印度最大的卷烟生产商 ITC Ltd. 在政府上调烟草产品税引发券商下调评级后，市值缩水约 70 亿美元。【原文：India’s largest cigarette maker ITC Ltd. wiped out about $7 billion in market value after a government tax hike on tobacco products triggered a wave of brokerage downgrades.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将从国有银行配售资金中挪用 45 亿美元
item.description: 印尼政府原计划将75万亿印尼盾（44.9亿美元）现金存入国有银行，但由于该举措对促进东南亚最大经济体的贷款影响有限，印尼政府将撤回这笔资金。【原文：Indonesia will pull back 75 trillion rupiah ($4.49 billion) of government cash it had planned to park in state-owned banks, citing the initiative’s limited impact on boosting lending in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 2026 年伊始新兴市场股票大涨，韩国誓言外汇稳定
item.description: 新年伊始，亚洲新兴股市在科技公司的带动下上涨。大多数地区货币窄幅波动。【原文：Emerging Asian stocks advanced at the start of the new year, led by gains in technology companies. Most regional currencies traded in narrow ranges.】

item.title: 中国降低电池废料进口税以促进回收行业发展
item.description: 中国降低了部分废电池的进口关税，以支持其回收行业。【原文：China has lowered import tariffs for some battery scrap in a fresh bid to support its recycling industry.】

item.title: 淡水河谷印尼公司因工作计划审批延迟而停止镍矿开采
item.description: 淡水河谷印尼公司（PT Vale Indonesia）的年度工作计划未获当局批准，因此暂停了其镍矿的运营。【原文：PT Vale Indonesia has suspended operations at its nickel mines after not receiving approval for its annual work plan from the authorities.】

item.title: 铜在经历了 2009 年以来最好的一年后因供应前景紧张而上涨
item.description: 2026 年的第一个交易日，铜价上涨，此前因市场趋紧的前景而创下 2009 年以来的最大年度涨幅。【原文：Copper rose on the first trading day of 2026, after capping the biggest annual gain since 2009 on prospects for a tighter market.】

item.title: 全球需求抵御特朗普冲击，亚洲制造业反弹
item.description: 贸易风向标台湾和韩国引领了亚洲制造业活动的反弹，这些企业乐观地认为，全球需求正在经受住唐纳德-特朗普总统对自由贸易发动的战争。【原文：Trade bellwethers Taiwan and South Korea led a rebound in Asia’s manufacturing activity, with firms heading into 2026 with optimism that global demand is weathering President Donald Trump’s war on free trade.】

item.title: 百度人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维秘密申请香港上市
item.description: 百度公司的人工智能芯片部门已秘密申请在香港首次公开募股，为支持中国技术雄心的公司在香港上市拉开了序幕。【原文：Baidu Inc.’s artificial-intelligence chip unit has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong initial public offering, kicking off what’s expected to be a busy year for listings by companies backing China’s technological ambitions.】

item.title: 尽管采取了降温措施，新加坡房价仍连续九年上涨
item.description: 由于对新公寓的需求增加，新加坡私人住宅价格连续第九年上涨，但涨势正在放缓。【原文：Singapore private home prices extended their rally into a ninth year on renewed demand for new apartments, but the boom is slowing.】

item.title: 中国提高人工智能效率，DeepSeek 推出新训练方法
item.description: DeepSeek 发表了一篇论文，概述了一种更有效的人工智能开发方法，说明中国人工智能产业在无法免费使用 Nvidia 公司芯片的情况下，仍在努力与 OpenAI 等公司竞争。【原文：DeepSeek published a paper outlining a more efficient approach to developing AI, illustrating the Chinese artificial intelligence industry’s effort to compete with the likes of OpenAI despite a lack of free access to Nvidia Corp. chips.】

item.title: 科技股飙升，中国多元资产基金表现抢眼
item.description: 去年，中国的多元资产基金凭借一个简单的策略，在科技股上大下赌注，从而击败了全球同行。【原文：Chinese multi-asset funds trounced their global peers last year with a simple strategy: bet big on tech stocks.】

item.title: 矿商下调产量预测后北极星股价下跌
item.description: 北星资源有限公司（Northern Star Resources Ltd.）的股价下跌了 10%，因为这家澳大利亚金矿公司在 12 月份出现一系列维护和运营问题后，下调了年度产量指导。【原文：Shares in Northern Star Resources Ltd. dropped as much as 10% after the Australian gold miner cut its annual production guidance following a string of maintenance and operational problems in the December quarter.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博警告 "错位 "货币，誓言维护外汇稳定
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang Yong）说，最近韩元的疲软并不反映该国经济的真正实力，他发誓要反对任何可能威胁外汇市场稳定的美国投资决定。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong said the recent won weakness doesn’t reflect the real strength of the country’s economy, and he vowed to oppose any US investment decisions that could threaten the foreign-exchange market’s stability.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片设计公司 Biren 在香港上市后首日大涨 82
item.description: 上海比仁科技股份有限公司是一家人工智能芯片设计公司，其首次公开募股募集到 7.17 亿美元资金，成为市场上最热门的行业之一。【原文：Shares of Shanghai Biren Technology Co., an artificial intelligence chip designer, jumped 82% in their trading debut in Hong Kong on Friday after its initial public offering raised $717 million in one of the market’s hottest sectors.】

item.title: 制造业激增，新加坡上季度国内生产总值增长 5.7
item.description: 尽管人们担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税会带来冲击，但新加坡的制药和电子制造商在 2025 年的最后三个月为经济提供了动力，推动全年经济增长达到自大流行病后反弹以来的最快速度。【原文：Singapore’s pharmaceutical and electronic manufacturers powered the economy in the final three months of 2025, pushing full-year growth to the fastest since its rebound from the pandemic despite fears of a shock from President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 黄金和白银在 2026 年开盘大涨后一路走高
item.description: 随着 2026 年交易的开始，黄金和白银在 1979 年以来最佳年度表现的基础上继续走高。【原文：Gold and silver advanced as trading in 2026 kicked off, building on their best annual performances since 1979.】

item.title: 新年伊始，石油价格与欧佩克+持平，委内瑞拉成为焦点
item.description: 在 2026 年的第一个交易日，石油价格创下 2020 年以来的最大年度跌幅，交易商在权衡即将召开的欧佩克+会议和地缘政治担忧后，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied on the first trading day of 2026 after its biggest annual drop since 2020, as traders weighed an upcoming OPEC+ meeting and geopolitical concerns.】

item.title: 市场综述：近期股市下跌后，2026 年股市开局将不温不火
item.description: 2025 年结束时，亚洲股市表现低迷，而在此之前的一年里，亚洲股市的表现却十分活跃。【原文：Asian stocks look set to begin trading cautiously after ending 2025 on a subdued note, following an otherwise buoyant year for equities.】

item.title: 华尔街对 2026 年的预期（几乎）如下
item.description:
700多条关键信息，包括人工智能支出和政府政策将如何推动经济增长、通胀可能难以战胜、私人资产将继续上涨以及美元将延续跌势。【原文：

Over 700 key calls on how AI spending and government policies are set to fuel growth, inflation may prove hard to beat, private assets will continue their rise and the dollar will extend its decline.
